name: Priya Sharma
headline: Senior UI/UX Designer at TechSolutions Inc.
summary: A highly creative and detail-oriented Senior UI/UX Designer with over 8 years of experience in crafting engaging and user-centric digital experiences. Proven ability to lead design projects from concept to launch, collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams to deliver intuitive and visually appealing products.

workExperience.title: Senior UI/UX Designer
workExperience.description: Lead the design of a new flagship mobile application, resulting in a 40% increase in user engagement. Mentor junior designers and establish new design system guidelines.

workExperience.title: UX Designer
workExperience.description: Conducted user research, created wireframes, and developed interactive prototypes for various client websites and applications.
